availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Maysville, Kentucky, shoemaker. Kentucky native. Son of James P. Wilson and Elizabeth Wilson. Married Amelia D. Wilson. Father of M. C. Wilson, W. F. Wilson, and T. P. Wilson. Boot and shoe maker in Maysville in 1850.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, District No. 2, p. 99; Find A Grave, "W F Wilson, Sr (1830 - 1910)," Memorial #39838459, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=39838459 (accessed October 4, 2017).
